cssmd:property-def.description: Word wrapping format
Color of an element's text
cssmd:property-def.syntax: #RRGGBB | Named Color | rgb(r,g,b) | rgba(r,g,b,a) | hsla(h,s,l,a) | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit AliceBlue AntiqueWhite Aqua Aquamarine Azure Beige Bisque Black BlanchedAlmond Blue BlueViolet Brown BurlyWood CadetBlue Chartreuse Chocolate Coral CornflowerBlue Cornsilk Crimson Cyan DarkBlue DarkCyan DarkGoldenRod DarkGray DarkGrey DarkGreen DarkKhaki DarkMagenta DarkOliveGreen Darkorange DarkOrchid DarkRed DarkSalmon DarkSeaGreen DarkSlateBlue DarkSlateGray DarkSlateGrey DarkTurquoise DarkViolet DeepPink DeepSkyBlue DimGray DimGrey DodgerBlue FireBrick FloralWhite ForestGreen Fuchsia Gainsboro GhostWhite Gold GoldenRod Gray Grey Green GreenYellow HoneyDew HotPink IndianRed Indigo Ivory Khaki Lavender LavenderBlush LawnGreen LemonChiffon LightBlue LightCoral LightCyan LightGoldenRodYellow LightGray LightGrey LightGreen LightPink LightSalmon LightSeaGreen LightSkyBlue LightSlateGray LightSlateGrey LightSteelBlue LightYellow Lime LimeGreen Linen Magenta Maroon MediumAquaMarine MediumBlue MediumOrchid MediumPurple MediumSeaGreen MediumSlateBlue MediumSpringGreen MediumTurquoise MediumVioletRed MidnightBlue MintCream MistyRose Moccasin NavajoWhite Navy OldLace Olive OliveDrab Orange OrangeRed Orchid PaleGoldenRod PaleGreen PaleTurquoise PaleVioletRed PapayaWhip PeachPuff Peru Pink Plum PowderBlue Purple Red RosyBrown RoyalBlue SaddleBrown Salmon SandyBrown SeaGreen SeaShell Sienna Silver SkyBlue SlateBlue SlateGray SlateGrey Snow SpringGreen SteelBlue Tan Teal Thistle Tomato Turquoise Transparent Violet Wheat White WhiteSmoke Yellow YellowGreen

cssmd:property-def.description: Font used for an element's text
cssmd:property-def.syntax: one of the system fonts | [font-style] [font-variant] [font-weight] [font-size]/[line-height] [font-family] | inherit

cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the font-variant values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Boldness of the font used for an element's text

cssmd:property-def.description: Decorations applied to font used for an element's text

cssmd:property-def.description: Location of the font file
Page breaks before an element
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the page-break-before values | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit always auto avoid left right

cssmd:property-def.description: Page breaks after an element
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the page-break-after values | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit always auto avoid left right

cssmd:property-def.description: Page breaks inside an element
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the page-break-inside values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Minimum number of lines of a paragraph to leave at the bottom of a page
Minimum number of lines of a paragraph to leave at the top of a page
Median volume of the waveform
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the volume values or any number between 0 and 100 or percentage of the inherited value
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit loud medium silent soft x-loud x-soft

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies whether text will be rendered aurally and in what manner
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the speak values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies a pause before speaking an element content
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Time in milliseconds or percentage of the value of the speech-rate property | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies a pause after speaking an element content
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Time in milliseconds or percentage of the value of the speech-rate property | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies a pause before and/or after speaking an element content
Auditory icon
cssmd:property-def.syntax: none | url([url to cue image]) | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Auditory icon
cssmd:property-def.syntax: none | url([url to cue image]) | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Auditory icons
Sound to be played as a background while an element's content is spoken
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the play-during values or url to the sound file | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Spatial information
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the azimuth values or angle in -360 to 360 degrees range | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit behind center center-left center-right far-left far-right left left-side leftwards right right-side rightwards

cssmd:property-def.description: Spatial information
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the azimuth values or angle in -90 to 90 degrees range | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit above below higher level lower

cssmd:property-def.description: Speaking rate
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the speech-rate values or integer value in words per minute | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit fast faster medium slow slower x-fast x-slow

cssmd:property-def.description: Voice family
cssmd:property-def.syntax: List of comma-separated, prioritized list of voice family names | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Average pitch (a frequency) of the speaking voice
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the pitch values or frequency in hertz | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit high low medium x-high x-low

cssmd:property-def.description: Variation in average pitch
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Value between 0 and 100 | inherit. 50 produces normal inflection.

cssmd:property-def.description: Height of local peaks in the intonation contour of a voice
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Value between 0 and 100 | inherit. 50 is a standard English-speaking male voice.

cssmd:property-def.description: Richness, or brightness, of the speaking voice
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Value between 0 and 100 | inherit. Lower values produce softer voice.

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies how puctuation is spoken
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the speak-punctuation values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies how numerals are spoken
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the speak-numeral values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The bullet characteristics of a list item
The bullet style of a list item
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the list-style-type values | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit armenian circle cjk-ideographic decimal decimal-leading-zero disc georgian hebrew hiragana hiragana-iroha katakana katakana-iroha lower-alpha lower-greek lower-latin lower-roman none square upper-alpha upper-latin upper-roman

cssmd:property-def.description: The bullet image of a list item
cssmd:property-def.syntax: none | url([url to bullet image]) | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The bullet position of a list item
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the list-style-position values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Indicates how much the counter is incremented for every occurence of the element
Defines the value that the counter is set to on each occurence of the element
Used with the :before and :after pseudo-elements to generate content in a document
cssmd:property-def.syntax: Text content | counter | quote values | attr(X) | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit close-quote no-close-quote no-open-quote normal open-quote

cssmd:property-def.description: Quotation marks for any number of embedded quotations
The direction that text flows in
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the direction values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The level of embedding with respect to the bidirectional algorithm
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the unicode-bidi values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The cell layout mode of a table
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the table-layout values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The table border model
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the border-collapse values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Distance that separates adjacent cell borders
Position of the caption box with respect to the table box
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the caption-side values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Controls rendering of borders around empty cells
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the empty-cells values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies whether table headers are spoken and how
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the speak-header values | inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: The cursor over an element
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the cursor values | url([url to the cursor resource]) | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: inherit auto crosshair default e-resize help move n-resize ne-resize nw-resize pointer progress s-resize se-resize sw-resize text w-resize wait

cssmd:property-def.description: A shorthand property for setting all background properties in one declaration
Specifies the painting area of the background images
Specifies the positioning area of the background images
Specifies the size of the background images
Preserves the readability of text when font fallback occurs
Selects a normal, condensed, or expanded face from a font family
cssmd:property-def.syntax: One of the font-stretch values | inherit
cssmd:property-def.enum: none wider narrower ultra-condensed extra-condensed condensed semi-condensed normal semi-expanded expanded extra-expanded ultra-expanded inherit

cssmd:property-def.description: Sets the opacity level for an element
Specifies whether or not to clip the left/right edges of the content, if it overflows the element's content area
cssmd:property-def.enum: visible hidden scroll auto no-display no-content

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies whether or not to clip the top/bottom edges of the content, if it overflows the element's content area
cssmd:property-def.enum: visible hidden scroll auto no-display no-content

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies the preferred scrolling method for elements that overflow
Rotates an element around a given point defined by the rotation-point property
Defines a point as an offset from the top left border edge
A shorthand property for setting the four transition properties
Specifies the name of the CSS property the transition effect is for
Specifies how many seconds or milliseconds a transition effect takes to complete
Specifies the speed curve of the transition effect
Specifies when the transition effect will start
A shorthand property for setting the four transition properties
Specifies the name of the CSS property the transition effect is for
Specifies how many seconds or milliseconds a transition effect takes to complete
Specifies the speed curve of the transition effect
Specifies when the transition effect will start
A shorthand property for setting the four transition properties
Specifies the name of the CSS property the transition effect is for
Specifies how many seconds or milliseconds a transition effect takes to complete
Specifies the speed curve of the transition effect
Specifies when the transition effect will start
Specifies where to open links (target destination)
cssmd:property-def.enum: current root parent new modal name

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies whether new destination links should open in a new window or in a new tab of an existing window
Specifies where new destination links should be placed
A shorthand property for setting the target-name, target-new, and target-position properties
Specifies the width of each column in a grid
Specifies the height of each column in a grid
Specifies the number of columns an element should be divided into
Specifies how to fill columns
Specifies the gap between the columns
Specifies the color of the rule between columns
Specifies the style of the rule between columns
cssmd:property-def.enum: none hidden dotted dashed solid double groove ridge inset outset

cssmd:property-def.description: Specifies the width of the rule between columns
cssmd:property-def.syntax: length | One of the column-rule-width values

cssmd:property-def.description: A shorthand property for setting all the column-rule-* properties
Specifies how many columns an element should span across
Specifies the width of the columns
A shorthand property for setting column-width and column-count
Allows you to make an element look like a standard user interface element
cssmd:property-def.enum: normal icon window button menu field

cssmd:property-def.description: Allows you to define certain elements to fit an area in a certain way
Provides the author the ability to style an element with an iconic equivalent
Specifies where to navigate when using the arrow-down navigation key
Specifies the tabbing order for an element
Specifies where to navigate when using the arrow-left navigation key
Specifies where to navigate when using the arrow-right navigation key
Offsets an outline, and draws it beyond the border edge
Specifies whether or not an element is resizable by the user
Defines the shape of the border of the bottom-left corner
Defines the shape of the border of the bottom-right corner
A shorthand property for setting all the border-image-* properties
Specifies the amount by which the border image area extends beyond the border box
Specifies whether the image-border should be repeated, rounded or stretched
Specifies the inward offsets of the image-border
Specifies an image to be used as a border
Specifies the widths of the image-border
A shorthand property for setting all the four border-*-radius properties

A shorthand property for all the animation properties below, except the animation-play-state property
Specifies a name for the @keyframes animation
